job.title: Sr. Software Quality Engineer
job.description: pJob DescriptionppstrongIf you are a Colorado resident and this role is a fieldbased or remote role you may be eligible to receive additional information about the compensation and benefits for this role which we will provide upon request  You may contact 8883677223 option 5 for assistancebrbrstrongstrongIn this role you have the opportunity tostrongppProvide leadership and is responsible and accountable to provide oversight throughout the software quality lifecycle as we move toward software based devicesbrbrstrongYou are responsible forbrstrongpullispanOversight of quality and risk management throughout the software lifecycle independently audits the adequacy of design specifications Verification ampValidation test plans and reliability test plans for productsspanlilispanParticipate with crossfunctional team with other business and engineering disciplines spanlilispanEstablish the principles of product and service quality evaluation and control for the system spanlilispanProvide independent oversight and review of the project deliverables throughout the product lifecyclespanlilispanEnsures that appropriate SW Quality plans are made that include all stages of the software life cycle and supports SW Quality Plan designspanlilispanValidates key design inputs like usability reliability performance supportability manufacturability localizability safety security privacy serviceability sustainability and costsspanlilispanProvides effective oversight of the execution of the SW Quality Plan and any Risk Management activities and of all design related activities during the software lifecyclespanlilispanCan lead quality related problem solving for softwarespanlilispanUse postmarket analytics and statistics to report on software performance in the field provide feedback to manufacturing suppliers or design teams and initiate field actions when requiredspanlilispanAct as a business partner single point of contact person assigned to project team responsible to ensure that software design quality related spanrequirementscriteriaspan are completed and meet SW Quality standards for every PRP milestonebrbrspanliulstrongTo succeed in this role you should have the following skills and experiencebrstrongullispanBachelors degree required in a technical disciplinespanlilispanWorking knowledge of appropriate global medical device regulations requirements and standards for Software in medical devicesspanlilispanAt least 5 years of related experience in a medical device or regulated industryspanlilispanExperience with Agile Methodology and different SDLCspanlilispanExperience with CICD and DevOps tools such as configuration management source control unit testing etcspanlilispanAble to work effectively with minimal supervisionspanlilispanProficient knowledge of domestic and international standardsspanlilispanStrong background in Design ControlsspanlilispanExperience in supporting international registrations andor clinical investigationsspanlilispanUnderstand LEAN concepts methodologies and deploymentspanlilispanMay require 5 travel annually with possibly some internationalbrspanliulpbrbrstrongWhy should
